name: Fishoot
description:
FISHOOT was made for LOWREZJAM 2022.

You're a fish who's so mad with the Sun for warming up your ocean. Hop on a fishing hook, blast through the atmosphere and teach that pesky Sun a lesson.

I didn't finish as much as I would have liked, but hopefully what's there is kinda ok! 

Controls:

- WASD to move

- Arrow Keys to shoot.

Made using Godot :) 

I'd love to hear how the Linux build runs - I use a Windows machine and this is the first time I've exported for Linux using Godot.
